housingTiers.label: Survival Housing
housingTiers.description: Shared rooms, hostels, or the cheapest possible shelter. Focus on basic safety and legality.
housingTiers.scenario: Shared bedroom in a house with multiple roommates

items.title: Shared Room
items.description: Bunk bed or single bed in a shared bedroom with 1-3 other people. Minimal privacy.
items.brands: Generic furniture from thrift stores, Facebook Marketplace, or hand-me-downs

items.title: Communal Bathroom
items.description: Shared bathroom with multiple people, basic fixtures, and likely frequent cleaning needs.
items.brands: Standard builder-grade fixtures, possibly older and showing wear

items.title: Limited Personal Space
items.description: A small closet or a portion of a room for personal belongings. Storage is at a premium.
items.brands: Plastic storage containers, secondhand dressers

items.title: Basic Utilities
items.description: Split electricity, water, sometimes included in rent. Internet may be slow or shared among many users.
items.brands: Local utility companies, budget internet service providers

items.title: Shared Kitchen
items.description: Access to a communal kitchen with shared appliances. Limited cabinet and refrigerator space.
items.brands: Older appliances from various brands like Hotpoint, Kenmore

housingTiers.label: Minimal Housing

housingTiers.scenario: Small studio apartment or efficiency unit

items.title: Studio/Efficiency

items.brands: IKEA furniture, Target basics, Walmart

items.title: Galley Kitchen
